text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whewie! My shoulders feel like<n>mashed roe! I must've had
so much<n>tension built up. Director, this<n>massage machine
really works<n>wonders!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Objection! This is not a massagemachine!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: What a wild turn of events. Grass, El,<n>are you both okay?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
We're golden! No te preocupes! The<n>machine was super
fun.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, but I should tell ya one thing,<n>King...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You're dead wrong about who's the<n>world's weakest.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Right, Grass? No way I'm the<n>world's weakest, right?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Of course not. What you did today<n>was remarkable. Your
performance<n>was amazing.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Claro que sí! But in the end, you stole<n>the spotlight with that
final blow.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Only because you showed me the<n>way.

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
What?! How are you accelerating so<n>fast? I thought you'd
used up all your<n>skills!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I don't need any fantasy skills! This<n>is a racecourse, the
place where an<n>Umamusume's true magic shines!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: What matters most is power and<n>endurance!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Those words helped me see past the<n>legend's lightning
metaphors to my<n>true innate power. You see...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
We're blessed with incredible leg<n>strength, as well as
enough physical<n>fortitude to withstand the potion<n>sickness
debuff.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I put the pieces together and realized<n>that a titanic
Umamusume kick would<n>strike harder than any bolt.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Just like when you won the race.<n>Even with all the magic
flying around,<n>your own two legs are what carried<n>you to
the finish line.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
You said it yourself. We put<n>everything on the line for the
sake of<n>one thing—victory.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Even in the face of danger, our desire<n>to reach the finish line
remains<n>unshaken.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
And while the game world was<n>fictional, we weren't just
playing<n>around.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I ran as fast as I could, just like<n>in real races!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Exactly. The shining goddess who<n>lends power to
Umanest's<n>adventurers is just a character, but...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Our Goddess of Victory motivates us<n>to keep running, no
matter when or<n>where.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Sí! You hit the nail on the head!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Ooh! I'm... so... inspired!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
This VR Umalator is designed not only<n>to help Umamusume
acquire new<n>skills, but to develop new bonds as<n>well!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Things didn't go quite to plan this<n>time, but we're working
on updating<n>the system to connect with even<n>more
worlds!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Wait, so you're planning to expand<n>this function?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
I need to install a fail-safe program<n>just in case things get
out of hand<n>again... Forced shutdowns are too<n>risky, and I
doubt I'd be allowed to do<n>one anyway...

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: This time, it was the legend. Next<n>time...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Did you say something, Tazuna?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: No, I was just talking to myself. ♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Nyahaha. Still, this looks like a great<n>way to kill some time. I
can't wait for<n>the next installment. ♪

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: So, who wants to be our next<n>challenger?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Again?! I'll give it another shot! I<n>wanna go! And Grass, I
want you with<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: El... Haven't you had your fair share<n>of fun already?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No way! I say keep the challenges<n>comin' and comin'!
Let's play<n>together more!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hey Director, where's the coin slot<n>on this thing? Oh, and
does it take<n>pesos?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: El, that's enough. We have training<n>today, remember?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: But Grass! It's one more go! Just<n>one!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
You're like a little child... If you don't<n>stop your whining, you
won't get any<n>dinner.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Anything but thaaaat!
